timeline.message:
[vividus] Add multiprofiles support
- configuration.profiles - new property used to set one or more profiles separate by comma where properties priority comes down from left to right
- configuration.profile - property is deprecated

- configuration.profiles - new property used to set one or more profiles separate by comma where properties priority comes down from left to right
- configuration.profile - property is deprecated

timeline.bodyText: why is it needed to be removed?
timeline.author: valfirst

replies.bodyText:
with this property here we can't check the following cases in integration tests:

only configuration.profiles is set
neither configuration.profiles nor configuration.profile is set
replies.author: uarlouski
